column1: Mask up folks. If you’re COVID+ please help the city health bureau do contact tracing. There’s no stigma — this is just about our community’s health. https://t.co/CZpuiIioIi
Covid is real. Wear a mask. Avoid gatherings. Please. https://t.co/DE7bd9EyOO

220K Americans have died & 8.4M have contracted #COVID19 on your watch Mr. President. You’re committed to destroying the ACA but your plan to protect the 26M Americans you would leave without care is...what exactly?  Where have I heard this before...? 🤔 https://t.co/xr14d7kcNO

Day 15: My kids went to public school in #PA07 so I understand how important it is for our schools & teachers to be well-funded.   When #COVID19 hit I made securing relief for our schools a priority. I'd want that for my family. I demand it for yours.  https://t.co/7kEPnrBMhH

Day #20: I work hard for #PA07 working families.   I've heard over & over again how #COVID19 has affected parents juggling remote learning. That's why I wrote a bipartisan bill (it passed the House!) to give families safe practical options for child care. https://t.co/FvIRLqOOrw

Day #21: #COVID19 devastated our local restaurant scene & I knew they needed direct support to keep their doors open.   So I listened to small business owners heard their concerns & helped lead the #RESTAURANTSAct AND got it passed through the House.  https://t.co/OYEDWYM4vP

Day #22: I'm working to keep our kids fed.  On the @EdLaborCmte I always prioritize expanding free & reduced lunch programs.  When COVID hit I knew we had to do more. I'm proud of the work my colleagues & I did to expand school meals during this crisis.  https://t.co/Mj63SZ6Z2M

Today is #NationalChildHealthDay but I work every day to protect the health of our kids. In Congress I've supported: 🩺 Funding for early childhood mental health 🩺 Protecting CHIPPER 🩺 expanded relief funding for children's hospitals during #COVID19  In #PA07 kids come first.
I'm working to make sure #PA07 is where an American supply chain starts– during this COVID-19 pandemic & beyond. Our manufacturers are up to the challenge. https://t.co/9wBI7LqhIK

I’ve worked to get free COVID testing & to get healthcare costs covered for anyone infected by the virus.   Getting more funding to protect nursing homes & frontline workers has been my priority.  Watch our newest ad below👇👇 https://t.co/cRD9XUD27j

A3: Health care is a right. I’ve worked to ensure everyone has that right by leading efforts to cap prescription drug prices expand mental health resources for all ages & introduce an emergency open enrollment bill to get people covered during this #COVID crisis.  #ELCare https://t.co/Y0PhhhzjgN

Even before #COVID19 there was a child care crisis in this country. I saw the tough decisions that #PA07 working families were making about child care & I knew something had to be done. Child care shouldn’t be a political issue.  https://t.co/FvIRLqOOrw

It was great to speak with Victor and the team at @MegaAllentown about COVID relief updates the importance of this year’s election.  Listen to our full conversation at the link below👇 https://t.co/ql7FPYDUxL

Thank you @United for showing your support in Allentown last week. The aviation industry has been hit hard by #COVID19. Airline workers need more relief ASAP. I’m proud to be an advocate for that in Congress. https://t.co/6hXonk2rjq
@ellencarmichael Thank you for telling more of Herman Cain’s story than we would ever have known. It makes me sad that he beat cancer but then COVID....

I have heard from too many families in our community that they are struggling to pay for food and keep meals on the table during these unprecedented times. We need increased SNAP benefits to help Pennsylvanians through the #COVID19 crisis. https://t.co/P8YDCSihoh

Mental health issues are one of the main focuses of my work in Congress. If you are struggling you are not alone.  Text PA to 741-741 for support throughout this #COVID19 crisis. https://t.co/RlRpZarAOY

Today kicks off National Public Health Week (@NPHW) during what is expected to be an incredibly difficult week for many American families with more cases of #COVID19 spreading across our communities.   In this time of social distancing our mental health is at risk as well.

After unanimously passing the House the president has signed the #OlderAmericansAct into law!  I'm proud to have co-led this initiative –– as we deal with the effects of #COVID19 on our seniors the resources that #OAA funds like Meals on Wheels will be critical.

Today on the 10th anniv of the #ACA and in the midst of the #COVID19 pandemic I co-led a bicameral bill to establish an emergency open enrollment period so no one is left uninsured during this crisis.  Every American should have access to quality and affordable health care.

In the face of the #COVID19 outbreak my focus is on the health safety and economic stability of everyone in #PA07.  All upcoming campaign events will be postponed to a later date but I will continue using this page to check in and share resources.  Stay safe and stay home!

Paid sick leave is a matter of public health.   We did our job in the House — we passed legislation to keep workers and members of the public safe. The Senate didn’t do theirs.  We can’t afford partisan politics while we work to combat #COVID19. https://t.co/1V09cT04Rt

🚨ATTN #PA VOTERS🚨  It is now easier than ever to request a mail-in ballot so that you can participate in the upcoming primary elections — even while taking #COVID19 precautions. 🗳  More info ⬇️ https://t.co/WqcVwBO1kD
